text: Your "watch" should be running in the background, pushing changes immediately. It's not really much different than seeing your changes locally, from what I've experienced.

I'm not sure this is the right channel, but I'm developing a custom theme using the cms-boilerplate. I created a menu in "Navigation menus" under settings and then created a new "Website page" using my template. All good so far. Then I realized I need to adjust my main navigation so I went back to Settings > Navigation menus and made the update. However, the web page is still showing the old version. I unpublished and published the page, cleared browser cache...still I'm seeing the old nav. Any thoughts? What am I missing?

Hey Jeff — this might be better suited for the <#C22PU4LV8|general> Channel. This is very unlikely related to the boilerplate. Sounds like it’s a cloudflare caching issue. Does the nav change if you open it up in an incog widnow?
Ok thanks for the advice. I'm pretty sure its a caching issue, just couldn't figure out exactly "where" it was being cached. I just opened it again and its loading as expected now.
